public abstract class ToggleButton
extends Label
implements IToggle, IObservable

Common behavior for two-state widgets.

setListener

public void setListener(ej.microui.Listener listener)
Defines which Listener to associates to the button.
Each selection action on an enabled button will call Listener.performAction(int, Object) passing (0, this), if the defined listener is not null.

Specified by:
setListener in interface IObservable
Parameters:
listener - the listener associated to the button, can be null.
